name: Lambskin Hides
description:
100% organic. These hides are originally made from animals and each one is unique. Makes the perfect natural layer. Measuring approx between 24"- 36"  at the largest point.

Photo by Photography by Trae and Melissa J Photography and Meg Bitton Photography.

name: Organic Curls Faux Fur
description:
This faux fur is crimpy and curly and so organic. The tuffs are arranged unevenly, and look wonderfully natural. The longest tuffs are nearly 1½”. The background and pile is mottled in brown and cream tones.
(S) 30″ x 36″ (L) 60″ x 36″
Hand wash, lay flat to dry.

Please allow 2 weeks for your orders to arrive.

Photo by Photography by Trae and Erika Muniz

name: Little Furs
description: The perfect sized mini furs. The fit is just right for most props.

name: Large Shearling
description:
Gorgeous natural shearling measures about 30″ x 30″. It is just lovely with organically styled set ups.

Photo by Melissa J Photography.

name: Twine Blanket
description:
Gorgeous blanket in all natural twine fibers shown as the bottom layer.

Photos by Kimmy Howard Photography, Simply Newborn Photography, kristlyn Grace Photography.

Also shown is the Mini Lux Blanket in Cool Neutrals. 

If ordered alone - ships within the week ordered.

name: Extra Long SimplyWrap
description:
New Longer SimplyWraps are now long enough to swaddle the little one you are photographing. Edges are frayed to add to the charm of the wrap.

Lovely photos by Kelley Ryden Photography, and Glow Portraits.

These wraps are not currently in stock and will ship to you within 4 weeks.

Also shown Mini Lux in purple pansy.

name: SimplyWraps
description:
A staple knit wrap for every newborn photographer. SimplyWraps are knit in a circular fashion, and the result is a tube that envelopes the newborn. Edges are frayed to add to the charm of the wrap.

So thankful for all the lovely photos from Kelley Ryden Photography, Captured by Kristin Photography, Glow Portraits, Jaiden Photography, Kimmy Howard Photography, and JAC Photography

name: Stretch Wraps
description:
Stretch knit wraps a staple item in newborn photography. Perfect for creative wrapping or swaddling. 

Size: 60x18" with lots of stretch

Hand wash in cold water.

name: "Fluff" Basket Stuffer - 20 color options
description:
Gorgeous fluff is the perfect little extra accent in your baskets and boxes to add a little dimension.  

Lovely photos by Kelley Ryden Photography, Lindsey Mills Photography, Brooke G Photography, Jaiden Photography,Keri Meyers Photography, Studio B Photography, Megan Wilson Photography,  Rachel Vanoven Photography, Jen Priester Photography, and Patricia Anderson Photography.

This item is made to order. Please allow approximately 3- 4 weeks for shipping.

name: "Mini Lux" Wrap/Blanket
description:
The yarn used to create this blanket is extravagant and very plush.  Beautifully dyed and hand spun into an amazing array of colors. This blanket is the mini version and is a little over half the size of the original. (20inches by 16inches) Each and every blanket is original, with no two identical.

Please allow 4 weeks for shipping - the yarn is created by a fiber artist and must be ordered & then knit.

Gorgeous photos by Jennifer P Photography, Jaiden Photography, Kimmy Howard Photography, Brooke G Photography and Kelley Ryden Photography. 

*Also shown: Extra Long SimplyWrap in Violet, Kelley Tweed bonnet, Kimmy bonnet in Seafoam Green.

name: Lacey Knit Blanket
description:
Open lace knit blanket. Measures 18x18 and is gorgeous as a wrap too!

Gorgeous Photo by Kimmy Howard Photography.

name: Dreamy Blanket
description:
Created from hand spun fibers. This blanket is lovely, and sure to be the blanket you reach for during your sessions. Measures approx 18inches by 18inches.

Photos by Kimmy Howard Photography, Glow Portraits, Rachel Vanoven Photography.

name: Lilac Buds
description: Sweet halo with darling little flower buds on a twisted band.

name: Snuggle Hoodie Pod
description:
Gorgeous little knit pod created with a hood. Can be worn with hood up or down. Adorable little bow can be tied in front or removed.

Photos by Kimmy Howard Photography and Rachel Vanoven Photography

Also shown Bliss Blanket in Pinks. 

Email me for more color options.

name: "Timothy" Beanie
description:
This adorable beanie as an inverted stripe shown off my the 'popped out' stitching.

Lovely photo by Milk & Honey Photography and Melissa Larson Photography.

This items is made to order, please allow 4 weeks for it to be made.

name: Bliss Blanket
description:
Gorgeous blanket in all natural fibers. It's the perfect 20x20 size when knit but it does shrink up a bit. Due to the unique nature of this yarn, each bliss blanket is one of a kind.

Photos by Kimmy Howard Photography, Tracy Raver Photography, Kelley Ryden Photography, Melissa J Photography and Nicole Smith Photography.

Yarn is created by a fiber artist and must be made for each blanket. Turn around time is approx 3-4 weeks.

Also shown Fluff in Seafoam, Twine Blanket/

name: Kelley Bonnet {fall colors}
description:
Adorable little bonnet now available in colors perfect for the season. 

Photo by Glow Portraits.

name: "Grayson" Chinstrap
description: Adorable little chinstrap bonnet is sure to be a hit with the boys (and girls)! Features the extra little trim on the brim stitching. Complete with little button accent.

name: Chocolate Curly Faux Fur
description:
This faux fur is crimpy and curly. The tuffs are arranged unevenly, and look wonderfully natural. The longest tuffs are nearly an 1”. The background and pile is mottled in chocolatey brown tones.
(S) 30″ x 36″ (L) 60″ x 36″
Hand wash, lay flat to dry.

Please allow 3 weeks for your orders to arrive.

name: Charlie Bonnet
description:
Triple stripes make this little bonnet adorable for the little guys.

Photo by Kimmy Howard Photography, Jennie Pyfferoen Photography and Photography by Trae.


Turn around time is approx 3-4 weeks.

name: "Rocco" Chinstrap Bonnet
description:
Adorable little chinstrap bonnet is sure to be a hit with the boys (and girls)! Features the extra little trim on the brim stitching. Complete with little button accent.

Photo by Photography by Trae and Kimmy Howard Photography.

name: Hayley Bonnet
description:
The sweetest of bonnets for your darling baby girls.

Photo by Melissa Wells Photography.

name: Dainty Bonnet
description:
Simple and sweet bonnet created from the softest spun fibers. 

Photos by Kimmy Howard Photography.

Also shown Flower Clip.

name: Little Loopy Blanket
description:
This blanket adds the perfect texture to your prop shots. It is approx 16x16inches the perfect size for a mini blanket!

Please allow for 3-4 weeks turn around time.

name: "Lux" Blanket
description:
Created with extravagant and plush fibers, this blanket is beautifully dyed and hand spun into this gorgeous neutral loveliness.  The blanket is approx 24inches x 24inches, each one is original, with no two identical.

Please allow 4 weeks for shipping as the yarn is hand spun and must be ordered & then knit.

Photos by Portrait Place.

name: "Glow" Bonnet
description:
This gorgeous little bonnet has lovely horizontal ribbing.

Photo by Glow Portraits and Kelley Ryden Photography.

name: Pure Wrap/Blanket
description:
Soft lambs wool fibers are used to create these amazing accent blankets.

Lovely photos by Jaiden Photography, Jennifer P Photography, Keri Meyers Photography, Organic Bebe Photography.

The yarn must be special ordered. Please allow for an approximate turn around time of 4 weeks.

name: "Jaiden" Bonnet
description:
Intricately knit with the signature "Jaiden" styled woven pattern within the body of the bonnet.

Lovely photo by Photography by Trae.

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 4 weeks for it to be create

name: "Keri" Bonnet
description:
This sweet little bonnet has the perfect subtle texturing.

Photo by Keri Meyers Photography.

name: Misty Blanket
description:
Lovely multicolored blanket is intricately knit and is the perfect pop of color for your newborn photos. Blanket is approximately 16inches by 12inches.

Gorgeous photo by Melissa Wells Photography, Misty Brogdon Photography, Jennifer Nace Photography, Keri Meyers Photography, Kelley Ryden Photography.

name: "Tripp" Stripes Beanie
description:
Little brimmed beanie has 4 little stripes.  

Gray and Navy photographed by Nixon Photography.

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 4 weeks for it to be created.

*Also shown Big Bump Blanket in Gray and Natural Blanket in Gray

name: Sailor Beanie
description:
A little sailor isn't complete without this adorable little beanie. Tan and Marine blue stripes adorned with a tiny red anchor.

Lovely photo by Jennifer P. Photography

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 4 weeks for it to be created.

name: Simple Beanie
description:
Brimless beanie comes in classic colors. Perfect for your little guy shoots.

Lovely photo by Jennifer P Photography and Sara-Bella Photography.

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 4 weeks for it to be created.

name: "Dewdrops" Bonnet
description:
This simple bonnet features a subtle texture much like the dew. 

Amazing photo by Dewdrops Photography by Amy McDaniel

Please allow 4 weeks this item to be created.

name: Dreamland Blanket
description:
This lovely blanket is the perfect backdrop for all your newborn set ups. This blanket is larger than most - approx 20inches by 20inches.

Lovely photo by Jennie Pyfferoen Photography, Kimmy Howard Photography and Nicole Smith Photography.

name: "Jax" Bonnet
description:
The Jax Bonnet has a contrasting trim with a woven knit to highlight the brim and a rounded back. 

Lovely photos by Keri Meyers Photography, Jaiden Photography, Captured by Kristin Photography, Kelley Ryden Photography.

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 4 weeks for it to be made.

name: "Kelley" Vintage Sunwashed Bonnet
description:
Made from delicate silk and cotton fibers, this bonnet is sweet and pure.

Special thanks to Milk and Honey Photography for this lovely photos.

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 4 weeks for it to be created.

*Also shown Sunwashed blanket in fog

name: "Kelley" Neutrals Bonnet
description:
The sweetest little bonnet for newborn photos. Intricately knit with a finished "Kelley" styled brim. Perfect for boys or girls. 

Lovely photos by Jennifer P Photography, Kelley Ryden Photography, Bobbi Sloan Photography, Milk & Honey Photography and Jaiden Photography.

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 4 weeks for it to be created.

Also shown Olive Big Bump Blanket and Extra Long Simply Wrap in Sand.

name: Striped "Kelley" Bonnet
description:
Intricately knit with a finished "Kelley" styled brim. But now with stripes!

Special thanks to Milk& Honey Photography and Glow Portraits for the gorgeous photos

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 4 weeks for it to be created.

Also shown Natural blanket.

name: "Kimmy" Bonnet
description:
Intricately knit with the signature "Kimmy" styled brim with the accent trim.

Lovely photo by Jaiden Photography, Captured by Erin Photography, Amy Cook Photography, and Rachel Vanoven Photography

Blossom/Lavender/Seafoam colors will be discontinued Sept 1.

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 4 weeks for it to be created.

name: 'Kristin" Bonnet
description:
Intricately knit with a double finished row signature of the "Kristin" Bonnet. 

Special thanks to Kelley Ryden Photography, and Glow Portraits for the gorgeous photos.

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 4 weeks for it to be created.

name: "Melissa" Bonnet
description:
This creme based bonnet is the perfect little bonnet for when you want a little color.

Photo by Melissa Larson Photography.

*Shown with Navy and Tide.

name: "Milk and Honey" Bonnet
description:
Amazing little bonnet for newborn photos. Intricately knit with a finished "Milk and Honey" ribbed styled brim.  

Special thanks to Milk & Honey Photography, Kelley Ryden Photography for the gorgeous photos

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 4 weeks for it to be created.

*Also shown Copper Big Bump Blanket and Sunwashed Blanket in Fog

name: "Milk & Honey" Marbled Bonnet
description:
Made from the finest baby alpaca, this bonnet is soft and luxurious. Bonnet is accented with the Milk and Honey styled brim.

Lovely photo by Kelley Ryden Photography.

This item is made to order, please allow approx 4 weeks for it to be made.

name: "Sinclair" Cable Twist Bonnet
description:
Bonnet accented with a cabled brim. Simple and elegant. The perfect addition to your prop collection. 

Gorgeous photo by Kelley Ryden Photography.

Bonnet is made to order, please allow 4 weeks for it to be made.

name: "Tracy" Striped Chinstrap Bonnet
description:
The bonnet that goes with everything. Intricately knit with a finished brim. Perfect for boys or girls. 

Special thanks to Kelley Ryden and Tracy Raver for the gorgeous photo

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 4 weeks for it to be created.

*Also shown Kelley bonnet and Lush Blanket (in twin photo)

*Lemongrass "Kelley" bonnet also shown.

name: Little Loves Stocking Cap
description:
Quirky little stocking cap is the perfect little something to accent your next newborn shoot. 

Special thanks to Rachel Vanoven Photography and Jen Priester Photography for the lovely photo of the Tide stocking cap.

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 2 - 3 weeks for it to be created.

name: Rosette Headband
description:
Simple and sweet little silk halo is perfect for darling little girls.

Photo by Kimmy Howard Photography and Photography by Trae.

name: Winter Blossoms
description:
Simple halo tieback is lovely with a touch of peach and a hint of lavender.

Photo by Stone-Hall Photography.

name: "Nicole" Headband
description: Sweet headband created from all natural materials.

name: "Ashley" Headband
description:
Adorned with a tiny bud with pearl center, this halo is delicate and pure.

Please allow 3-4 weeks for your item to be created.

name: "Angel" Silk Halo
description: Delicate twisted flower with a pearl center. Frayed edges add to the charm of this dainty little headband.

name: "Jen" Silk Ribbon Halo Tieback
description:
Gorgeous raw silk is crochet into this luxurious tieback. Buy Two and they can be worn FIVE ways! Singly, doubled, with the bow tied in front, or twisted here, as shown in the photo.

Special thanks to Jennifer P Photography, Jaiden Photography and Rachel Vanoven Photography  for the lovely photos.

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 4 weeks for it to be created.

name: Flower Clip
description:
Adornment for hats and bonnets.

Special thanks to Glow Portraits and Milk & Honey for the gorgeous photos.

This item is made to order, please allow approximately 3 weeks for it to be created.

name: Big Bump Blanket Multi Color (Magical Unicorn Hair Bump)
description:
This gorgeous blanket is created in colors YOU choose. I will have the fibers dyed to your specifications. Choose up to 4 colors. 

Please email me at devotedknits@gmail.com with your color specifications. If you do not specify you will receive a variation of the color shown here in the first photo. 

Photo by Rachel Vanoven Photography.

name: Aqua Big Bump Blanket *Devoted Knits Original*
description:
Lovely accent blanket that can be used alone or as a basket stuffer. The blanket is approx 17"x14". Each blanket is reversible - with a different pattern on both sides.

Lovely photo by Jennifer Nace Photography, Rachel Marie Photography, Kelley Ryden Photography and Jaiden Photography.

Please allow 4 weeks for shipping as the yarn is not in stock and must be ordered & then knit.

name: Get Styled Online Workshop
description:
I will work with you one on one to discover your photography style. This consultation is designed for newborn photographers. Currently booking for the end of June at this special introductory rate.

What attendees are saying:
Kristy Hewitt Mutchler: I learned so much from you today! Thank you for being so thorough and open to all our questions. It was amazing to finally meet you.

Jo Davis:  I definitely recommend the one on one style consult especially if you are trying to figure out *your* own style. Not only will she work with you to find your style, she will also share with you little tricks to turn your existing props into new ones! Yes, it is possible  EMAIL HER!
